chapter_ajax.description: If this is set, the bot will assume the website uses ajax API for chapters.

request_method.description: This specifies the tool the bot will use to make requests.

url_regex.description: The regular expression to match manga URLs for this website.

verify_ssl.description: Whether to verify the SSL certificate of the search URL

base_url.description: The base url of the website without the '/' at the end.

icon_url.description: The icon url of the website. This will appear in the embeds as the author image.

dynamicURL.description: Whether the website has IDs in the URLs for manga and chapters.

ajax.description: Format url used to build the manga ajax url to scrape chapters.

manga.description: Format url used to build the manga url to request for scraping.

latest_updates_url.description: The url where the latest chapters appear on the website. Usually this is the base url.

no_status.description: This indicates whether the website has a status displayed for the manga on the page.

items.description: Used to calculate the status of the manga based on the last release date of the latest chapter on the manga if there's no status available.

requires_update_embed.description: Whether the bot should make a custom updates embed for each chapter or not.

can_render_cover.description: Whether the website allows rendering images on discord or not.

chapter_regex.description: Used to find the ID for chapters if it differs from the manga id. This usually specifies 3 keys: 'before_id', 'id' and 'after_id'

char.description: The connecting character that is used to separate the ID from the URL.

before_id.description: Whether the connecting character comes before or after the ID.

missing_id_connector.description: If the chapter or manga uses IDs, then this needs to be defined.

url_chapter_prefix.description: This is the character that will come between the base url + url name and the chapter url (when it's not provided as a whole.)

supports_search.description: Indicates whether the website supports a search feature
